VIII.i.3.E.1.b
.
Effective Date for Termination of Chapter 18 Benefits
In the event of death, discontinue Chapter 18 benefits on the last day of the month
before
the month in which the child died.
Note
:  Handle abandoned claims for Chapter 18 benefits in the same manner as for compensation, pension, or Dependency and Indemnity Compensation.
Reference
:  For more information on the effective date for termination of benefits, see
38 CFR 3.503(b)
.
